1.content: So what are you going to be? Saiyan, Namekian, or Human?
1.title: Saiyan, Namekian, or Human

11.content: are you a boy or a girl?
11.title: Male?  Or female?

1111.content: Your name is Golu. He and Goku were identical twins and came in the same space pod. When Uncle Gohan found you guys he realized this and decided to give you both almost identical names. You and Goku from a young age were very strong with a power level of 100 for Goku and 150 for you. the only reason for you being stronger was because you started off at a slightly higher power level and you trained even more than Goku! The forest nearby, unfortunately, never quite looked the same. you would always practice in the forest and was taught the Kamehameha earlier. But one night while you were 8 and while Goku was up in his room, and Uncle Gohan was sleeping, you snuck out to train. unfortunately there was a full moon. Goku survived only because while you were a Great Ape, you smashed the house and he turned into a Great Ape too. Needless to say, Uncle Gohan died. now you are 12 and looking for 7th Dragon ball so you can wish Uncle Gohan to life.

choices: I'm looking for a ball with stars on it
11112.content: You hold up the dragon radar. A few springs are hanging loose. Goku got careless while fighting and the radar was fractured, so you sent him to beat up the red ribbon army to find another. You pocket the dragon radar and head off the road to train. "OUTA THE WAY!" you hear. You whip around and instinctively throw up your hands in defence. The very fast moving hunk of metal stops the moment it touches your hands. Or, at least stops with a massive hole in it. "What are you doing on the road?!" The lady behind the wheel shouts. She has blue hair, and is actually quite cute. You respond...
11112.title: you find Bulma

1113.content:
It's been 19 years since you barely escaped Planet Vegeta's destruction. You were barely 2 years old at the time, but you remember a few things about your life on the planet.

Your parents were...
1113.title: Welcome to the Grand Tour!

choices: Kakarot and the others on Earth.
A new life form...made by Tuffles?
11131.content:
...were Low Class Warriors. Overt few people took note of them, but your life was simple and good. Not amazing, but not terrible. You were sent to a nearby planet when Freeza destroyed Vegeta, but your parents both died in the explosion. You'd love to show them how far you've come. You've been training, going from Planet to planet, training, originally to kill Freeza, but you heard that Freeza was already killed by the son of Bardock, Kakarot, who resides on the Planet Named Earth. All the remaining Saiyans do, including the Prince Vegeta.

You met the Yardrats, who taught you instant transmission. This made your spaceship pointless, since you could travel anywhere at will. Using this power, you use your scouter to look around for Kakarot and the others. Should be possible, as you had the best Scouter made, able to detect power levels from galaxies away.

You find...
11131.title: Low-Class Warriors

choices: You’ve officially become a Super Saiyan
You’re a Super Saiyan. Wait... you’re still changing?!
111311.content:
You managed to find Kakarot’s energy as well as a few others and immediately used Instant Transmission to get to Earth. Once you’re there, you see everyone surprised when they spotted you. It was all awkward silence at first before you spot a man wearing an orange and blue fighting uniform.

“You! Are you the one named Kakarot?” You asked him while him and everyone looked more surprised when you said that name.

“Well, technically, yes. But it’s really Goku. But how did you know that name?” Goku wondered until he figured it out. “Wait. Are you a Saiyan?”

“I am. I’m (your name).” You introduced yourself as you see Prince Vegeta standing there as well. “I see you’re doing fine yourself, Prince Vegeta.”

“Enough with the chatter. Why are you here?” Vegeta wondered.

“I heard of Frieza’s demise being done by Kakarot, or “Goku”, here. I didn’t believe it at first until I overheard the Frieza Force going into a panic for his death. It’s a shame really.” You said.

“Why’s that?” Goku wondered.

“I was training day in and day out for a chance at revenge against Frieza for my parents were killed when Planet Vegeta exploded. That opportunity is now out the window.” You said as you looked closely at Goku. “Now I just wanted to face the guy that put that bastard in his place.”

“So you’re saying you want to fight me?” Goku figured.

“If you think you can keep up.” You said cocky.

“Alright then. Let’s go!” Goku said as you two go into battle positions.

The others watched from the sidelines as you and Goku took your battle stances staring at each other.

“Come, Goku. Show me what you had to take Frieza down.” You said.

“You’ll see.” Goku said with confidence as you two charged at each other.

So far, it was you two throwing punches and kicks at each other. Those years of training really paid off as you’re holding your own against Goku. Few of the others find you pretty good as Goku was finding it hard to land a blow on you. You then caught an opening and landed a good blow to his face.

“Seems (your name) truly has some talent.” The Namekian named Piccolo said looking on at the fight.

“Yeah. He gave Goku a good blow right there.” A bald human named Krillin said.

“Just be the landed a good blow, doesn’t mean he’s special. Don’t get excited just yet.” Vegeta said eyeing on the fight.

“Gotta say, you’re really good with your fighting skills. You’re pushing me back to wall and hardly giving me a an opening to strike.” Goku said excited to fight a strong adversary like you.

“Well, I sure wasn’t lounging around when our planet died. But that was just the warm up.” You said.

“In that case, how about we crank it up a bit?” Goku suggested.

You were confused at first until you felt his energy rise so fast. That was when you saw him transformed. His hair went from black to yellow and his eyes were green. Not to mention he looks a bit bigger.

“Think you can take me on now?” Goku said.

“Wha-What the hell is that supposed to be?!” You asked in shock to see him change into this.

“Wait a second! Are you telling me you can’t turn into a Super Saiyan? That’s just pathetic.” Vegeta said in the background.

“Super Saiyan? So the legends are true?” You said in awe before smirking again. “So this must be how you were able to beat Frieza. I’ve always sensed a strong Saiyan’s energy so far away, but never knew why until now.”

“You must be getting excited now you’ve seen me like this.” Goku said.

“It has caught me by surprise, I’ll give you that. Let’s see what this form’s really made of.” You said going back into the fight.

You charged at Goku to hit him when he sidestepped and landed a punch of his own, one that’s more powerful than it was when he was normal. That Super Saiyan form really did gave Goku a huge boost.

You were having difficulty holding against the transformed Saiyan as he’s now the one giving you a good beat down. You did managed to hit him, though it didn’t have much affect on him than it did before. After going through that, you’ve finally get why they call this form Super Saiyan.

“This is something else. I bet Frieza was shaking with fear when he first saw this.” You said.

“He did. Let me tell you, it’s an incredible boost to me. Now I think it’s time to make you a Super Saiyan.” Goku said to your surprise.

“Me? A Super Saiyan?” You pointed at yourself.

“Yeah. I can tell you have the stuff to do it. You just need to push yourself more.” Goku said as you’re now interested to try.

“If you say so. What do I have to do?” You asked.

“You need to get really angry.” Goku said.

“That’s it?” You asked.

“A Super Saiyan is awaken by raw fury. Once you did that, you’ll have a great increase like I did. Try it out.” Goku said as you nodded.

You think back at the deaths of your parents and the rest of your species and it definitely gets you emotionally pissed off. You can feel your power rising as this could work.

When it was done,...
111311.title: Meeting Kakarot/Goku

info.brief_description: you take part in Goku's adventures as a:kid, teen, or adult as a Saiyan, Namekian,or human
info.description:
Take part in Goku's adventures in an alternate time line where Goku had a twin brother/sister or where Demon King Piccollo accidentally seperated his soul in two halves each taking a different body or be a regular fighting human like krillin who happened to meet them

This story (unless you are Goku's Brother/sister) starts off just before Goku's son, Gohan, gets taken by Raditz. As long as the Chapters remain believable you can add any plot twist, character or anything as long you can describe the new person or know their name.
